title: Ramses II
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 2,064 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1200L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Q and X
description: Ramses II was only twenty-five years old when he assumed the throne of Egypt. During his sixty-six-year reign, he would build more temples than any other pharaoh and negotiate the world's first recorded peace treaty. Learn more about this fascinating leader with this book.
